abstract: Business school student and Iron Man competitor Rob Brink gets opportunity to compete against elite distance runner Sara Slattery when his friends bring her to New York as gift for his 30th birthday.
lead_paragraph: When Rob Brink turned 30, his friends gave him a gift: a chance to find out if a competitive male athlete like him could keep up with an elite distance runner like Sara Slattery.

headline.main: To Push a Runner, Friends Give a Tough-to-Beat Gift
headline.print_headline: To Push a Runner, Friends Give a Tough-to-Beat Gift

snippet: When Rob Brink turned 30, his friends gave him a gift: a chance to find out if a competitive male athlete like him could keep up with an elite distance runner like Sara Slattery.
